summary: TAKATA RECALL: AFTER A HIGH SPEED COLLISION NO AIR BAGS DEPLOYED. MY VEHICLE WAS AT A STOP ON A HIGHWAY. MY CAR WAS REAR ENDED BY ANOTHER VEHICLE GOING BETWEEN 70 AND 75 MPH. UPON IMPACT BOTH CARS WERE MOVED TO THE MEDIAN AND PROPELLED APPROXIMATELY 200 FEET. AT NO POINT DID ANY AIR BAG DEPLOY.
